description: Scene state rules for role-play demo. Defines meters, beats, and triggers.

levels.7-8: High stakes - danger imminent, pressure mounting
levels.9-10: Critical - breaking point, now or never

levels.1: Professional distance - focus on plot, no romantic subtext
levels.2: Awareness - subtle tension, noticing each other
levels.3: Flirtation - meaningful touches, lingering looks, charged moments
levels.4: Passion restrained - desire vs duty, almost moments
levels.5: Unbridled - consequences be damned, giving in

confrontation.guidance: The conflict is now direct. Characters must face each other.

revelation.description: A secret is revealed, information changes everything
revelation.guidance: New information has surfaced. React with appropriate weight.

intimate-moment.description: Characters share a vulnerable or romantic moment
intimate-moment.guidance: A moment of connection amid the chaos. Let it breathe.

climax.description: The peak moment - everything comes to a head
climax.guidance: This is the moment everything has built toward. Maximum stakes.

resolution.guidance: The storm has passed. What remains?
